MWC.GUI.DragDrop

Class FileDropSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • MWC.GUI.DragDrop.FileDropSupport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileDropLocationSupport

    public class FileDropSupport
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener
    class proving support for drag and drop of files from Windows to the indicated Java (AWT or JFC) component
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Ian Mayo

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FileDropSupport.FileDropListener
      interface to be supported by classes which want to listen out for files being dropped

        public void setFileDropListener(FileDropSupport.FileDropListener listener,
                                java.lang.String suffixes)
        add a class a listener for file drop events
        Parameters:
        listener - the listener, which will be told of receive events
        suffixes - the file suffix to accept (including the dot)
